verse: तद्वा अस्यैतदतिच्छन्दा अपहतपाप्माऽभय रूपम्। तद्यथा प्रियया स्त्रिया संपरिष्वक्तो न बाह्यं किंचन वेद नान्तरमेवमेवायं पुरुषः प्राज्ञेनात्मना संपरिष्वक्तो न बाह्यं किंचन वेद नान्तरं तद्वा अस्यैतदाप्तकाममात्मकाममकाम रूपमशोकान्तर॥
meaning: Meaning:Or, on the other hand, the form of this person is such that their mind is purified or controlled, free from sins, and fearless. Just like a person who is embraced or united with a beloved woman does not know anything externally or internally, similarly, this person, with wisdom or knowledge, does not know anything externally or internally. Or, on the other hand, the form of this person is the form of one who has fulfilled desires, desired by oneself, and desireless, free from grief or sorrow.
